title: Macedo (D. Bernardo da Costa de Sousa)
original_title: Macedo (D. Bernardo da Costa de Sousa)
body:
He was appointed Civil Governor of Madeira by decree of February 21, 1901, and took office on May 9 of the same year.

By decree of June 6, 1906, he was, for the second time, appointed Civil Governor of the district, and took office on the 23rd of the same month and year.
